timeline.message:
XRDDEV-849 Remove reflecting input in response

- Remove path and message from the default JSON error response.
- Add CustomErrorAttributes implementation.

timeline.bodyText: Hmmm, I would say this does not belong to org.niis.xroad.restapi.domain package. That package does have bit of this and that currently, and is maybe not pure "domain" even now, but I think this one fits better in org.niis.xroad.restapi.config (since it is configuring aspects of Spring framework like most others in that package) or maybe org.niis.xroad.restapi.exceptions.
